derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the sense 'thong', also as a nautical term): probably a West Germanic adoption of Latin stroppus 'thong'
late 20th cent.: probably a back-formation from stroppy

means.word_mean: 1. a leather strap used to sharpen razors
